    Methods in GAElements with parameters of type Population
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static int
    Fitness.calculateFitness(Population aPopulation)
    The function calculateFitness returns the fitness score of Individual in the given population by substituting Individual chromosome elements [a, b, c, d] in equation 2*a+3*b-(c*c)+d = 100.
